snippet.title: Madagascar: Join the Circus! App Trailer
snippet.description:
In Madagascar: Join the Circus!, you are the Ringleader of this one-of-a-kind traveling show as it tours Europe on its way home to New York!  Build and decorate your Big Top into the WORLD'S GREATEST CIRCUS, and clown around with your favorite Madagascar pals in circus-themed arcade games.  

Keep fans entertained with exciting new attractions, zany amusements and unique sideshows.  You'll be surprised by what the Madagascar bunch thinks of next!
